name: Open Sorcery: Jingle BEL/S
description:
This content requires the base game Open Sorcery on itch.io in order to play.

Technology. Magic. Presents

Open Sorcery: Jingle BEL/S celebrates the first Christmas of a newly sapient AI.

Barter with disgruntled elves.

Incinerate deadly holiday cards.

Protect your network.

Dream.

And get presents for all your friends.
